titles.title: A resolution honoring the life of Kevin Hagan White, the Mayor of Boston, Massachusetts from 1968 to 1984.
A resolution honoring the life of Kevin Hagan White, the Mayor of Boston, Massachusetts from 1968 to 1984.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Pays tribute to the life and accomplishments of Kevin Hagan White, the Mayor of Boston, Massachusetts, from 1968 to 1984.
